Assign a new label object to a SIAMCAT object

assign-label.Rd

Assign a new label object to a SIAMCAT object

label(x) <- value

# S4 method for siamcat,list
label(x) <- value

Arguments

x

an object of class siamcat-class

value

an list (in label format)

Value

none

Examples

data(siamcat_example)
label(siamcat_example) <- label(siamcat_example)
